overview: Shot entirely on location at a secluded mountain ranch HE FUCKED MY FATHER features an A-list cast of both ALL WORLDS and RASCAL EXCLUSIVES. Director DOUG JEFFRIES sexually charged tale stars CAMERON MARSHALL as the guy who's dad all his buddies want to bed down with. Hairy Masculine KEN MACK plays the father who eventually strips down and throws his legs up for Big Dicked Twink CAMERON TAYLOR. Filled with stunning videography, top notch editing and clever direction this is one hot fuck flick, filled with many standout performances by BLAKE RILEY, JOSH VAUGHN and newcomer VANCE WINTER.
title: He Fucked My Father
